body.p: This subpart implements the Federal Acquisition Supply Chain Security Act of 2018 (title II of Pub. L. 115–390) and the Federal Acquisition Security Council (FASC) regulation at 41 CFR part 201–1. The authority provided in this subpart expires on December 31, 2033 (see 41 U.S.C. 1328).
